title: Windowstekniker/Systemadministratör till familjärt...
description:
SysPartner erbjuder konsultation inom infrastruktur och systemutveckling samt hostinglösningar och helhetskoncept för IT-drift. Vi strävar efter att vara det lilla familjära företaget samtidigt som våra konsulter ofta får chansen att arbeta i en större organisation med spännande tekniska lösningar hos våra kunder.


I rollen som konsult på SysPartner erbjuds du konsultuppdrag där du ges du möjlighet till snabb utveckling och chans att höja din kompetens inom relevanta områden. Vi jobbar framförallt med längre uppdrag och våra kunder är oftast medelstora och stora bolag med spännande miljöer i teknisk framkant.

  

Som systemadministratör kommer du leverera klient- och servertjänster och vara en del i drift- och supportteamet hos vår kund.

### **Vem är du?**


För att passa i rollen som Windowstekniker/Systemadministratör tror vi att du har arbetat minst åtta år inom området. Vi ser helst att du har relevant utbildning. Rollen kräver att du har goda kunskaper i:

* Avancerad felsökning av klient, server och nätverk
* Deployment och administration av servrar (uppsättning/installation och drift, on prem)
* Planering och produktionssättningar av nya system
* Automation och scriptning
* Migreringar
* PowerShell
* Djupa kunskaper i Active Directory
* Ansible eller likvärdigt automationsverktyg  

  

 Om du har specialistkompetens inom något eller några av följande områden är det meriterande:
* Migreringar och plattformsuppgraderingar
* Virtualiseringsplattformar på OS och applikationsnivå
* Sql och Exchange
* VWware Horizon
* Azure, Office365 och andra molnplattformar


Du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Befattningen kommer kräva att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tids gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där krav finns på säkerhetsklassinplacering, kan i förekommande fall, medföras krav på visst medborgarskap.


I och med säkerhetsklassningen är tjänsten placerad 100% på plats hos vår kund i deras lokaler.


Vi söker dig som har ett stort tekniskt intresse och gillar att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och hänga med i branschens utveckling. I rollen som konsult är du vårt ansikte utåt vilket kräver ett gott kundbemötande och en professionell attityd. Vi jobbar enligt mottot att SysPartners konsulter är trevliga proffs som gör det lilla extra för kunden. Vi söker därför en ödmjuk och ärlig person som visar intresse och nyfikenhet inför uppgiften. Det omväxlande arbetet som konsult ställer stora krav på din vilja och förmåga att anpassa dig och lära dig nya saker.

### **Vilka är vi?**


SysPartner levererar tjänster inom infrastruktur samt systemutveckling. Vårt fokus ligger på konsultverksamhet men vi har även hostinglösningar och helhetskoncept för IT-drift. SysPartner har funnits sedan 2005 och har kontor i Linköping, Västerås, Stockholm och Luleå.


SysPartner erbjuder dig som anställd en rad förmåner, bland annat möjlighet till personalbil, friskvårdsbidrag, en personlig hårdvarubudget, föräldralön, sjukvårdsförsäkring, sjukförsäkring, tjänstepension, vidareutbildning, samt en rad sociala aktiviteter varje år där vi träffas och har roligt tillsammans.

### **Låter det spännande?**


Välkommen med din ansökan via vårt rekryteringssystem!

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Us**


**Consilium Safety Group, a recent acquisition by Antin Infrastructure Partners, is a global leader in fire and gas safety technology, serving diverse industries including marine, energy, rolling stock, and building sectors. With over a century of experience, we combine deep safety expertise with cutting-edge detection technology to protect lives, assets, and the environment. Headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden, we operate across more than 55 offices worldwide, ensuring we cover all time zones. Our commitment to innovation and growth drives us to shape the future of Safety-Tech.**


**Responsibilities:**


* Architect, design, and implement advanced software solutions for new and existing products.
* Evaluate requirements, analyze problem definitions, and propose operational solutions.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and design software solutions accordingly.
* Author clear documentation, code comments, and maintain coding standards.
* Design system specifications, software standards, and oversee code deployments.
* Conduct systems analysis and recommend improvements to operations and processes.
* Ensure data security protocols are followed and protect confidential information.

**Qualifications:**


* Bachelor’s and/or master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, or related technical discipline.
* 5+ years of professional software development experience.
* Proficiency in C#, Java or other programming languages for back-end and front-end development.
* Strong object-oriented design skills and knowledge of application architecture.
* Familiarity with software engineering best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source code control, testing, and operations.
* Experience leading technical aspects throughout the software development lifecycle.
* Experience in developing distributed systems, scalability, and high-volume transaction processing preferred.

**Why Consilium Safety Group?**


* Collaborative and diverse work environment.
* Opportunity to work on impactful projects that contribute to global safety.
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Career development and growth opportunities within a global organization.

**Apply Now**  

If you're passionate about software development and making a difference in safety technology, we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team at Consilium Safety Group.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Planboo
description:
Hi! We’re excited you’re here :)


This opening is for our partner, Planboo.


We help organizations around the world build teams for a sustainable future. Together we are on a mission to leverage technology to regenerate our planet and advance human potential.


Planboo is committed to revolutionizing carbon removal through innovative biochar solutions. Working with climate-conscious businesses, farmers, land stewards, and biochar producers, Planboo provides the tools, technology, and training needed to transform sustainably sourced biomass into biochar, generating carbon removal credits and enhancing soil health. Their mission is to permanently remove CO₂ from the atmosphere, supporting people and food systems to prosper.

**The Challenge**


Are you an experienced Backend Engineer looking to take on a leadership role in a mission-driven organization? As the **Tech Lead Software Engineer** at Planboo, you will architect and build scalable backend systems that power our innovative biochar solutions. You will spearhead the brainstorming and development of creative solutions to complex technical challenges, working closely with your team and cross-functional teams to drive our mission forward.

**Your challenge:** Lead the development of robust systems that scale our carbon removal technology globally.

**Key Responsibilities**

* + **Technical Leadership:** Set the technical direction and establish best practices that enable the team to succeed in building reliable and scalable software.
	+ **Product Development**: Collaborate with the product team to continuously improve existing products and develop new features that align with our roadmap.
	+ **Team Mentorship**: Guide and support team members as the team grows, providing technical mentorship and fostering a collaborative work environment.
	+ **Integration:** Collaborate with hardware teams for software-hardware integration.
	+ **Backend Development:** Architect and develop scalable backend services.
	+ **DevOps & CI/CD:** Build and maintain **CI/CD pipelines**, and manage containerization using **Docker**.
	+ **Cloud Infrastructure:** Manage and optimize cloud resources on **AWS**, leveraging services like **ECS, S3, RDS** and **Lambda**.
	+ **Microservices & Scalability:** Design and implement robust, scalable, and fault-tolerant systems.
	+ **Data Management:** Work with **relational databases(PostgreSQL, MySQL).**
	+ **Security & Performance:** Ensure system security, scalability, and performance optimization.

**Requirements**

**What We’re Looking For**

* 6+ years of experience in **Software Engineering**.
* Experience with software development, system design, and architecture.
* Experience with developing RESTful APIs and integrating third-party API’s.
* Strong expertise in **AWS** and cloud-native tools.
* Strong understanding of CI/CD tools and modern software design patterns for scalable and maintainable systems
* Experience in managing containerization using **Docker**.
* Knowledge of security frameworks for user and service authentication and authorization.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for mission-driven work.
* Having taken on a leadership role in a project or team setting.

**Nice-to-Haves**

* Experience with **TypeScript/JavaScript**.
* Experience with **headless CMS** platforms.
* Familiarity with **BI integration** tools (such as **Metabase**, **Tableau**, **Power BI**, or **Looker**).
* Knowledge in serverless architecture.
* Experience with hardware or IoT-integrated solutions.
* Experience with carbon removal projects, embedded systems, or working in international, mission-driven teams.

**Benefits**

**What We Offer You**

* An opportunity to make a measurable, positive impact on global carbon removal efforts.
* The chance to work directly with Planboo’s leadership team and contribute to high-level strategic decision-making.
* A flexible, mission-driven work environment with room for personal and professional growth.
* Travel opportunities to project locations, including spending time in **Sri Lanka** for several weeks.

**Who We Are**


Join a diverse team of engineers, farmers, scientists, and visionaries tackling global challenges. We believe in Win-Win collaboration, Relentlessness, and Authenticity. Planboo is committed to advancing CO2 removal, addressing global inequality, and fostering a workplace where diversity of thought is celebrated.


Planboo is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer, and we encourage applicants of all backgrounds to apply.

title: Lösningsarkitekt till Arkitekturenheten – Jordbruksverket, Jönköping
description:
Om arbetsplatsen


Jordbruksverket finns för att främja en ökad och hållbar matproduktion och god djurvälfärd i hela Sverige. Vi bidrar till en levande landsbygd. Hos oss arbetar cirka 1850 personer. Huvudkontoret ligger i Jönköping men vi har även stor regional verksamhet.
  

  

Vi arbetar aktivt för att våra medarbetare ska vara hållbara och trivas på jobbet! Vi investerar långsiktigt i våra medarbetare och vill att de utvecklas tillsammans med oss! Vi erbjuder en god arbetsmiljö med generösa förmåner med upp till 35 semesterdagar, friskvårdsbidrag samt friskvårdstid. I en stor del av våra anställningar erbjuder vi en flexibel arbetstid, möjlighet att jobba mobilt och arbeta delar av arbetstiden på distans.  

  

Läs mer om hur det är att arbeta på Jordbruksverket på vår webbplats: www.jordbruksverket.se/jobbahososs
  

  

Jordbruksverket är en av Jönköpingsregionens största IT-arbetsgivare. Vi strävar efter att ligga i framkant inom både arbetssätt och teknik. På vår utvecklings- och digitaliseringsavdelning arbetar över 200 personer tillsammans i många olika roller för att lösa verksamhetens och våra kunders behov av digitalisering genom moderna och effektiva IT-lösningar. Inom avdelningens väggar ryms allt från storskalig systemutveckling på flera olika plattformar till drift, förvaltning och support. Läs mer om vår IT-verksamhet på: jordbruksverket.se/utvecklingochdigitalisering


Arbetsuppgifter


Vill du forma robusta lösningar som håller över tid och bidra till samhällsnyttan?
  

På Jordbruksverket söker vi nu en senior lösningsarkitekt som vill spela en nyckelroll i att bygga och utveckla vår IT-arkitektur.  

  

Till Arkitekturenheten söker vi nu dig som vill arbeta som Lösningsarkitekt med en stark koppling till systemutveckling på Jordbruksverket. I arbetsuppgifterna ingår att både vara visionär med nya lösningar, men på samma gång vara förankrad i vardagen och se möjligheterna med befintliga system och hitta framkomliga vägar för stabilitet, arkitektur och säkerhet.  

Du deltar i den operativa processen med att granska, stödja och stötta projekt och andra utvecklingsaktiviteter där du ingår som Lösningsarkitekt men ingår även i den övergripande arkitekturgruppen som består av Verksamhetsarkitekter, Informationsarkitekter och Infrastrukturarkitekter.
  

  

Vad innebär rollen?  

Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss kommer du att:  

* Arbeta tvärfunktionellt i flera projekt, där du kliver in och ut efter behov.
* Sätta upp riktlinjer, principer och lösningsmönster som utvecklingsteamen kan använda och förhålla sig till.
* Samarbeta med ett starkt arkitektteam som spänner över verksamhets-, lösnings-, mjukvaru- och infrastrukturarkitektur.
* Utveckla robusta lösningar som är skalbara, flexibla och förvaltningsbara med fokus på helheten och långsiktighet.

  

Kvalifikationer


Vi söker dig som har relevant utbildning inom IT-området och flerårig erfarenhet av arbete med övergripande IT-arkitektur. Vidare har du gedigen teknisk kompetens inom Java.  

  

Meriterande är om du även har arbetat inom opensource och öppna plattformar. Vi ser gärna att du har arbetat med modulering av arkitektur i verktyg så som Enterprice Architect. Vårt arbetsspråk är svenska så du behöver kunna uttrycka dig väl på svenska i tal och skrift.  

  

I denna rekrytering kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Vi söker dig som har en god förmåga att tänka kreativt och hitta innovativa lösningar på komplexa utmaningar. Du bidrar med nya perspektiv och idéer som stärker verksamheten och dess utveckling. Din kommunikativa förmåga gör att du kan uttrycka dig tydligt och anpassa budskapet till olika målgrupper. Du är lösningsorienterad och tar dig an problem med struktur och fokus. Med din proaktiva inställning bidrar du till hållbara och välgrundade beslut.
  

  

Vad erbjuder vi?  

* Möjlighet att påverka och bygga Jordbruksverkets arkitektur och strategiska riktning.
* Flexibilitet med distansarbete, men också tillgång till vårt kontor i Jönköping.
* Ett meningsfullt arbete där du bidrar till samhällsnyttan och utvecklar lösningar för Sveriges jordbrukssektor.
* En arbetsplats med högt i tak och en stark teamkultur.

  

Intresserad?  

Låter det som en roll för dig? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt team av engagerade arkitekter!

title: Koordinator till stab HR IT
description:
Om arbetsplatsen


Kommuner och regioners verksamheter är välfärdens kärna. Det är verksamheter som berör miljontals människor, varje dag. Våra medlemmar har gett oss ett tydligt uppdrag: att Sverige ska ha världens mest innovativa och omtänksamma välfärd.
  

  

De kommande åren står vi inför utmaningar som kräver mod, kreativitet, kompetens och förändringsvilja. Vi tar med det som är bra idag när vi skapar morgondagens välfärd. Vi möter förändring med utveckling. Vi tror på dig och på din förmåga.  

  

Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet från offentlig sektor, är digitalt driven och vill bidra till att effektivisera processer. Här får du en varierande roll där du arbetar brett med administration. Ansök redan idag!


Arbetsuppgifter


Du är en del av HR-funktionen på sex personer med ansvar för att säkerställa smidiga processer och effektiv hantering av ärenden. I rollen som koordinator arbetar du självständigt med varierande administrativa och koordinerande uppgifter. Du har ett nära samarbete med kollegorna på HR och övriga staber för att skapa och implementera smidiga arbetssätt.  

  

En stor del av ditt arbete handlar om administration i system, svara på frågor från organisationen och söka lösningar när information saknas. Arbetsuppgifterna är breda och omfattar bland annat ärendehantering, utbildningsadministration, systemförvaltning samt faktura- och lönehantering. En central del av rollen är att bidra i att utveckla digitala arbetssätt. För att lyckas krävs att du har ett digitalt arbetssätt och en förståelse för hur tekniska lösningar kan bidra till effektivare processer. Du behöver tydligt kunna kommunicera och ibland utmana eller förtydliga frågeställningar tillsammans med intressenter för att nå bästa resultat.  

  

Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid, placerad i moderna lokaler på Södermalm. Tillträde sker snarast enligt överenskommelse.


Kvalifikationer


För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har:  

  

* Flerårig erfarenhet av administrativt arbete, varav minst 5 år inom offentlig sektor.
* Gymnasieexamen.
* Mycket god systemvana, särskilt i Office 365.
* Ett digitalt arbetssätt och förmågan att dra nytta av digitala verktyg i organisationer.
* Erfarenhet av lönehantering inom offentlig sektor
* Goda kunskaper i svenska, i såväl tal som skrift

  

Det är särskilt värdefullt om du också:  

* Har goda kunskaper i SharePoint.
* Har erfarenhet av dokumenthantering och intranät inom offentlig verksamhet.
* Kan kommunicera muntligt och skriftligt på engelska

  

Som person är du lösningsorienterad med ett starkt driv att utveckla och förbättra arbetsmetoder. Du ser möjligheter där andra ser hinder och arbetar för att hitta effektiva, digitala och hållbara lösningar som stärker organisationen.  

  

Vidare har du en naturlig förmåga att anpassa dig till olika människor och situationer. Du är lyhörd, samarbetsvillig och fungerar väl med kollegor på olika nivåer. Din serviceinriktade inställning gör att du alltid strävar efter att leverera det som bäst stödjer organisationens mål.  

  

Du har också en stark kommunikationsförmåga. Som aktiv lyssnare säkerställer du att beslut och riktlinjer förmedlas tydligt och respektfullt. Du tvekar inte att vara rak och tydlig när det behövs, samtidigt som du bidrar till en gemensam förståelse och riktning.
Ansökan


Referensnummer: C223648

title: Senior Data engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Rollen kröver att man har kunskap om **Linux, Python och SQL.**  

Du kommer arbeta i ett team som inför META data-plattformen.  

Azure DevOps är något man kommer komma i kontakt med i samband med utveckling.  

Så kunskap om Azure cloude tjänster är ett önskemål  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* AZDO devops erfarenhet.
* Ansible erfarenhet
* Linux erfarenhet
* 1-2 år erfarenhet av python.

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av **Abinito Metadata Catalog.**


• Har jobbat förut i hårt reglerade miljöer som t.ex **bank, försäkring eller myndighet.** • Hybrid mellan on-prem och cloud miljö.  

* Har jobbat förut med Data governance och känner till koncept som lineage, DQ, profilering och Koncept modeller.
* Är van vid att kommunicera med olika stakeholders i företaget som Infrastruktur, Affärs Beställare,Systemägare, Användare.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 13-12-2024 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Projektledare – Utvecklingsområdesansvarig inom IT
description:
### **Som utvecklingsområdesansvarig inom ett specifikt IT-utvecklingsområde ansvarar du för att samordna och driva utvecklingsområdets leveranser. Du skapar och följer upp leveransplaner, säkerställer synergier mellan olika delar och arbetar för en effektiv leveransprocess. Rollen innebär också att du visualiserar och kommunicerar kapacitet, prognoser och framsteg till intressenter, samt hanterar utmaningar och eskaleringar vid behov.**

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**

* Säkerställa leveranser enligt plan.
* Driva effektivisering och förbättring av leveransprocessen.
* Kommunicera kapacitet, förmåga och prognos till relevanta intressenter.
* Uppnå målsättningar och realisera effekter.

**Kravprofil**  

För att lyckas i uppdraget har du:

* Minst 8 års erfarenhet av projektledning, uppdragsledning eller förvaltningsledning inom IT-verksamhet.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av liknande roller inom statlig verksamhet under de senaste fem åren.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta med agil transformation, från traditionell projektstyrning till en agil utvecklingsmodell.

**Meriterande erfarenheter**

* Arbetat med agila metoder och verktyg.
* Kunskaper i Jira och Confluence.
* Erfarenhet av system och processer inom tullklarering eller liknande områden.


Är du en driven och erfaren projektledare som söker en spännande möjlighet att bidra till en viktig verksamhet? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan!

title: Data Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Create, maintain and operate data products based on business requirements and given architectural guidelines
* Provide feedback regarding the operating model, architectural guidance and platform services to continuously improve

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Deep knowledge and passion for modern data architecture principles
* Experience in design, development and operation of data pipelines
* Extensive hands-on experience as Data Engineer in an agile environment
* Comfortable working independently and collaboratively
* Pragmatic approach, understanding the trade-offs between the perfect solution and a working solution
* Passion for improving code quality as well as data quality
* Knowledgeable about data modelling, data access and data storage techniques
* Experience with cloud technologies (Azure and AWS)
* Experience in applying data privacy and protection methods/tools

**Meritorious**  

* Applying product thinking when working with data
* Data governance
* Modern data architecture as data mesh
* Familiarity with machine learning pipelines, generative AI and ML pipelines
* Knowledge in data cataloging, observability platforms to ensure data reliability and compliance
* Familiarity with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB and Cassandra

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 10-12-2024  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Hands on IT arkitekt till innovativ konsultbolag
description:
**Är du en erfaren arkitekt med ett skarpt öga för tekniska detaljer och en vilja att arbeta nära utvecklingsteamet?**  

Söker du en roll där du kan kombinera strategiskt tänkande med operativt arbete, samtidigt som du har friheten att påverka din egen karriär? Då kan detta vara nästa steg för dig!

**Om rollen**  

Som hands-on arkitekt hos oss kommer du att arbeta både strategiskt och operativt. Du leder arbetet med att designa och implementera robusta, skalbara och framtidssäkra lösningar hos några av Sveriges mest spännande företag. Här är du länken mellan vision och verklighet – en arkitekt som inte bara ritar upp lösningar utan också är med och bygger dem.

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har minst flera års erfarenhet som arkitekt, med en gedigen bakgrund inom systemutveckling.
* Har djup kunskap inom teknologier som Java, .NET, molntjänster (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) eller microservices.
* Trivs med att arbeta nära utvecklingsteamet och kan guida dem genom tekniska utmaningar.
* Är van vid att kommunicera med både tekniska och affärsinriktade intressenter.
* Har en förmåga att balansera långsiktiga strategier med kortsiktiga leveransmål.
* Flytande svenska och engelska är ett krav

**Vad vi erbjuder:**

* **Flexibelt och lukrativt upplägg:** Du bestämmer själv hur din lön distribueras. Buffra, spara eller ta ut extra lön när det behövs.
* **Fullserviceadministration:** All administration hanteras åt dig – från fakturering och bokföring till löneutbetalning och årsredovisning.
* **Utvecklingsmöjligheter:** Delta i kunskapsfestivaler, konferenser och nätverk som du själv väljer.
* **Trygghetspaket:** Garantiinkomst vid uppstart och mellan uppdrag, så att du kan fokusera på det som verkligen räknas.
* **Ett starkt nätverk:** Du får tillgång till ett omfattande kundregister, ramavtal och en säljorganisation i toppklass.
* **Social hållbarhet:** Vi prioriterar balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder stöd i alla aspekter av ditt uppdrag.

**Varför välja oss?**  

Hos oss får du friheten att forma din karriär i en miljö där innovation, trygghet och gemenskap står i centrum. Du är en del av ett väletablerat varumärke med bred kundbas och tillgång till marknadens mest spännande uppdrag.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
  

För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Ready for a new adventure building the next-generation retail experience?
  
  

At Bambuser, our customers’ business is our passion. We genuinely believe in the individuals’ potential and work together as a team to pursue our vision — to reimagine the future of retail.
  
  

We offer you an open, honest, friendly workplace where everyone’s opinion counts. Since our days are busy, we think it’s important to have fun at work. The discussions can be intense, but we always have each other’s backs.
  
  

What you will do
  
  

Join us at Bambuser as a Data Engineer and play a pivotal role in creating and scaling our future-ready data platform. As part of our dynamic team, you'll leverage your skills to craft innovative data-driven features and solutions that help our organization make better, data-backed decisions.
  
  

With a focus on GCP technologies like BigQuery, Dataflow, Airflow and Appengine, you'll use SQL, python and Node.js to transform data and build pipelines that are reliable, efficient, and secure. As a key player in our architecture and ELT systems, you'll proactively seek out opportunities to improve our processes and solutions, taking our data capabilities to the next level.
  
  

Collaborating with stakeholders across the company, including analysts and product teams, you'll help ensure that our data infrastructure and tracking meet the needs of our growing organization.
  
  

If you're passionate about data engineering and excited about creating transformative solutions that will shape our future, we want to hear from you. Come join our team at Bambuser and take your career to new heights.
  
  

We value
  
  

Skills and background
  
  

Master degree in computer science or engineering
  
  

3+ years experience in data engineering
  
  

Solid knowledge in building high-quality solutions for analysts
  
  

Experience in building data pipelines processing large data sets
  
  

**Experience using cloud platforms:** GCP, AWS, Azure
  
  

Knowledge in the concept of Data Warehouse Automation and Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) tools e.g. Dataform, DBT, Airflow,...
  
  

Passionate about building data processing applications
  
  

An agile mindset, a willingness to try new things and collaborate with the team
  
  

Interest in building and maintaining CI/CD
  
  

Nice to have
  
  

Working knowledge of Git (or similar), Docker, Terraform, Python
  
  

Experience with transformation tools, Dataform or DBT
  
  

Experience with client logging
  
  

Experience working with streaming data
  
  

Above all, we assume that you are curious and not afraid to ask when in doubt.
  
  

Tools we use
  
  

GCP, BigQuery, Dataform, Dataflow, Airflow, Terraform, Python, Thoughtspot
  
  

This is Bambuser
  
  

Bambuser’s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the world’s largest brands and retailers. At the forefront of live streaming technology since 2007, Bambuser launched interactive eCommerce solutions in 2019 and quickly became the platform of choice for companies worldwide. We have been used by thousands worldwide for everything from sporting events, real-time news, drone shots, product launches, immersive virtual-reality shows, shoppable catwalks, and many more. Our team has established long-term partnerships and supported campaign activations for brands and retailers including Adidas, Hugo Boss, Dior, FENDI, Clarins, Shiseido, John Lewis, Tommy Hilfiger, Selfridges, QVC, and many others.
  
  

Bambuser values diversity and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds, regardless of your race, gender, religion, age, ability, or other characteristics.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Are you a Senior Data Engineer? If so, Greenely is looking for an exceptional individual to join our team! Greenely is the energy consumer platform dedicated to helping families navigate the increasingly complex world of electricity. Our mission is to reduce your energy bill to zero, not merely by optimizing home energy usage, but by enabling you to generate virtual power. Our mission is to enable every home to play a vital role in the energy transition in Europe.

**What you’ll be doing :**


As a Senior Data Engineer you will play a pivotal role in creating a robust, secure, and scalable data infrastructure for both operational and analytical data pipelines. Tasked with building and optimizing data flows, you’ll work to transform raw data into actionable insights while also implementing best practices in data governance and security. This role involves designing, deploying, and maintaining scalable data solutions to support product growth, enhancing data accessibility, and implementing data security protocols. You’ll collaborate closely with product, engineering, and analytics teams to develop processes that ensure data integrity, availability, and compliance, setting up the company for sustainable data-driven decision-making. Experience with real-time streaming data and/or life cycle management of machine learning models is a plus.


Direct stakeholders are data scientists, business analysts and product managers who needs structured, high quality data in their daily work. The role includes identifying competence gaps in the domain as well as onboarding and mentoring of data engineers and the broader organization as a whole in ways of working.

*Detailed scope of the assignment will be set and revised continuously together with CTO but* ***overall responsibilities include****:*  



* Design and implement data architecture including ETL pipelines, storage and backup procedures to enable key user flows
* Work together with leadership and stakeholders to ensure data brings maximum value to Greenly's business
* Ensure data is reliable and available for analysis by stakeholders, that naming conventions are used consistently and unambiguously.
* Implement system for life-cycle management and version control of ML models including training- and evaluation datasets.
* Setup process to enable monitoring of key operational robustness metrics ensuring problems are alerted and escalated in a timely manner
* Create system support to track what data is stored where, for what purpose and who has access to it. This to facilitate compliance with regulatory procedures and user requirements
* Together with technical leadership craft and implement relevant policies and procedures to enable scalability, regulatory compliance and security aspects

 **What you'll need to succeed :**



* **Data Architecture & Engineering**:
	+ Proven experience designing and implementing scalable data architectures, including ETL pipelines and storage solutions.
	+ Expertise in database technologies (SQL and NoSQL), data modeling, and performance optimization.
	+ Knowledge of real-time data streaming technologies (e.g., Kafka, Spark Streaming) is a plus.
* **Data Governance & Security**:
	+ Strong understanding of data governance frameworks, data cataloging, and regulatory compliance.
	+ Ability to implement robust security protocols to ensure data privacy and protection.
* **Data Pipeline Optimization**:
	+ Hands-on experience building and optimizing data workflows for both operational and analytical use cases.
	+ Ability to ensure data reliability, consistency, and availability through proactive monitoring and troubleshooting.
* **Monitoring & Metrics**:
	+ Expertise in setting up monitoring systems for operational metrics to proactively address system issues.
We also put big emphasis on your collaboration, leadership, problem-solving and communication skills.

**What we can offer you** ‍ **:**

  

* *Flexibility*: We are an office-first company that values in-person collaboration, offering flexible work arrangements to support your work-life balance. Our vibrant office is conveniently located in the heart of Stockholm at Vasagatan 40.
* *Growth*: Elevate your career with opportunities for skill development, challenging projects, and advancement within our forward-thinking organization.
* *Influence and Impact*: Your voice matters. Shape the future of energy by contributing your ideas, expertise, and playing a key role in decision-making.
* *Innovative Environment*: Thrive in an ever-changing industry, working on cutting-edge projects and staying ahead of the curve in a dynamic and pioneering work atmosphere.

 **About Greenely**

  

Greenely is on a mission to create the best customer experience for the modern energy consumer through technology. As a digital energy provider, we help people reduce their electricity costs by optimizing their home and car's electricity usage with our smart app. Supported by Nordic venture capital companies, we aim to enable households worldwide to connect, control, and optimize their energy usage. We believe that the best electricity is the one that is never used - a win-win for both wallets and the environment!

  

WE ARE **bold and push the limit.**

WE BELIEVE THAT **f****ast is better than slow.**

WE **t****hink like owners.**

WE **lead with knowledge.**

title: IT Architect
description:
We’re looking for an IT Architect to help take our digital ecosystem to the next level. If you’re passionate about technology and thrive in an environment where no two days are the same, we want you on our team. This role is based in the heart of Stockholm city at Pophouse headquarters.

**About Pophouse Entertainment**


Pophouse is a pioneer – investing in and developing intellectual property and companies within the entertainment industry. We invest capital, creativity, and passion to unlock the power of entertainment. This is our purpose, and what we love to do. At Pophouse, we amplify the value of our brands by working passionately on developing them into next-generation entertainment experiences and connecting them to new audiences.

**What you’ll do**


As an IT Architect at Pophouse, you’ll design and implement IT solutions that drive performance, security, and cost-effectiveness. You’ll help automate processes, integrate systems, and future-proof our IT environment. It’s all about making sure our tech runs smoothly and evolves with the times.

**Key responsibilities**

* Keep a comprehensive overview of the IT environment to ensure everything works seamlessly together
* Automate business processes to save time and reduce errors
* Integrate IT systems and harness data from multiple sources to improve decision-making
* Keep up-to-date with the latest tech trends and tools to keep us ahead of the curve
* Lead IT projects and migrations, ensuring smooth implementation and adoption
* Making sure that IT solutions are aligned with the IT strategy – from a technical point of view

Provide expert-level technical support to your IT colleagues  
* 

**Who you are**


You’re an IT pro with a passion for systems integration and process automation. You thrive on solving complex problems and finding innovative solutions. With at least seven years of experience under your belt, you bring expert-level knowledge of modern technologies. You’re a natural collaborator who loves sharing knowledge and working closely with others.

**Your skills & experience**

* Vocational college education in IT or equivalent work experience
* 7+ years of full-time experience as a IT professional
* 3+ years working hands-on with a Microsoft 365 enterprise environment of 100+ users
* Expert-level skills in M365 E3/E5 Security suite, PowerShell, Power Automate, Entra ID, Intune, and collaboration tools (Teams or equivalent)
* Advanced-level skills in Power BI, Azure IaaS, networking, and operating systems (Windows/macOS/iOS)
* Proven track record of successful data integrations and IT implementations
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset

  

**Why Pophouse Entertainment?**


We’re not just a place to work—we’re a place to thrive. Join us for the chance to shape the future of technology while collaborating with a dynamic team of innovators. You’ll be empowered to drive change and work on meaningful projects.


Ready to make an impact? We will interview candidates on an ongoing basis so if you're interested, please apply today and help drive innovation at Pophouse Entertainment!

title: IT-rättsjurist
description:
*Vill du vara med och bygga ett säkrare samhälle?*


Redpill Linpro är Nordens ledande leverantör av Open Source-produkter och tjänster där vi har tunga experter inom API & Integration, utveckling, Cloud, DevOps & IT Management. Vi är inne i en expansiv fas inom cybersäkerhet där fokus är expandera med konsulter inom IT-rättsjurister och informationssäkerhetsspecialister.  

  



IT-rättsjuridik har blivit en allt viktigare fråga för företag och organisationer, och Redpill Linpro har märkt en ökad efterfrågan på juridisk rådgivning inom detta område. För att möta detta behov erbjuder företaget nu juridisk rådgivning från specialister inom IT- och informationssäkerhet.


Som IT-rättsjurist på Redpill Linpro stöder du kunder med juridiska frågor vid leveranser av IT- och digitaliseringslösningar, med fokus på cybersäkerhet, risk- och konsekvensanalys samt lagstiftning. Du hjälper till att balansera verksamheternas behov med de legala konsekvenserna och ger råd om vilka frågor som bör hanteras. Du kommer att arbeta strategiskt i ett team med olika experter inom IT-säkerhet och informationshantering.


Majoriteten av företagets kunder finns inom offentlig och statlig sektor, vilket ger möjlighet att bidra till samhällsnytta, särskilt i en tid av ökande cyberhot.

**I rollen som** **IT-rättsjurist** **kommer du exempelvis att**

* Bedriva strategisk rådgivning och stötta kunder i arbetet med IT-rättsliga frågor, ofta relaterade till informations- och cybersäkerhet, sourcing, AI etc.
* Arbeta med IT- och säkerhetsrelaterad compliance
* Medverka vid risk-, hot-, sårbarhets- och konsekvensanalyser samt och utformandet av åtgärdsplaner etc.
* Bidra och stötta vid införande av ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet (LIS), ISO27001 certifieringsprojekt eller annan form av systematiskt informationssäkerhetsarbete
* Kunna verka som dataskyddsrådgivare, compliance officer, informationssäkerhetssamordnare, informationssäkerhetskoordinator eller motsvarande hos våra kunder
* Leda workshops, seminarium, föredrag
* Ta fram kommunicera och implementera styrandedokument etc.

Du förväntas även internt arbeta och samverka nära den egna säljorganisationen, övriga affärsområden och kollegor.

 **Kvalifikationer**

* Juristexamen, eller annan universitets-/högskoleutbildning i juridik/rättsvetenskap
* Minst 4 års relevant yrkeserfarenhet inom juridik, rättsvetenskap, compliance
* Kunskap om IT- och digitaliseringsrelaterad juridik (exempelvis NIS/NIS2, DORA, GDPR, AI-förordningen, CRA)
* Flytande i svenska både i tal och skriftligt. Eftersom många av våra kunder arbetar i global organisation, är det även viktigt att du är bekväm med engelska i tal och skrift
* Erfarenhet från M365 eller andra dokumentations-/kommunikationsplatformar
* Värderingar som överensstämmer med devisen 'people first’

**Vi tror att du är en självständig lagspelare,** har entreprenörsanda och är ivrig att hjälpa oss i vår fortsatta tillväxt. **För att komplettera vårt team är** **det även meriterande om du har erfarenhet från**

* Informationssäkerhetsarbete och sekretessfrågor
* Upphandling/anskaffning av IT-lösningar, licenshantering och sourcingfrågor
* Sektorerna hälso- och sjukvård, medicinteknik, industri, bank, Finans, försäkring, offentlig sektor
* Arbete med vedertagna säkerhetsstandarder (CIS Controls/CIS18, NIST, ISO2700x, ISO900x etc)
* Projektledning, förändringsledning, organisation
* Arbete med strategisk rådgivning
* Rollen som konsult


Särskilt meriterande är det om du har jobbat strategiskt med IT- eller säkerhetsjuridiska frågor nära ledning och chefer.


**Vi erbjuder**

* En unik chans att få forma och bygga vidare på personalkulturen i en ny avdelning. Vi vågar att satsa på våra anställda!
* En familjär och platt organisation
* Möjlighet att tillhöra och influera en nordisk koncern med stark tillväxt. Lär dig mer om oss här!
* En välkomnande företagskultur som präglas av kunskapsdelande, både mellan våra anställda, men även genom events och vår podd https://www.redpill-linpro.com/resources/it-talks-podcast.
* Långsiktiga partnerskap med stora och välkända aktörer inom tech.
* Certifiering under ISO-standards för att garantera kvalitet, säkerhet och kompetens på våra tjänster och produkter.


Missa inte att kika in vår senaste karriärfilm och denna video om vårt Stockholmskontor!


Redpill Linpro är företaget som grundades med en fascination för Open Source och som nu kan stoltsera med bolag inom flertalet IT-områden och ca 350 medarbetare i Norden. Vi ser oss som ett ekosystem tillsammans med våra kunder och partners, men i grund och botten är det alltid ’people first’ för oss. Alla anställda på Redpill Linpro är en viktig del i vår framgång där vi värnar om kompetensutveckling genom föreläsningar, kurser, utbildningar och events. Framför allt bryr vi oss om varandra och ser till att ha roligt ihop, både på arbetstid men även utanför jobbet i form av AWs, middagar och andra aktiviteter.


Vill du bli en del av oss? Ansök nedan! Känner du någon som skulle passa i rollen? Sprid ordet!

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
About Sinch
  
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
Description
  
Are you a skilled backend software developer ready to grow into a leadership role while staying hands-on in technology? Join us as a Tech Lead Manager, where you’ll lead an empowered development team delivering scalable components for data optimization, billing, account management, and product configuration tooling.
  
This role offers a perfect blend of leadership and technical contributions, giving you the opportunity to guide a team of developers while actively shaping the technical direction.
  
Responsabilities
  
* Define clear goals, coach your team members, and foster a collaborative, growth-oriented environment.
* Work closely with your product partner to plan and build the right solutions at the right time.
* Stay hands-on by contributing to backend development, driving DevOps practices, and supporting code reviews, testing, and quality assurance.
* Manage salaries, performance, and career development for your team members.
* Ensure high-quality, timely delivery of technical solutions that meet business needs.
* Balance people leadership with strong technical contributions, making yourself a go-to resource for the team.


Requirements
  
* Strong experience in backend development such as .NET or Java technologies.
* Hands-on knowledge of DevOps practices, including CI/CD and infrastructure as code, and Kubernetes.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
* Experience with code reviews, testing, and ensuring software quality.
* Proven leadership experience or a strong desire to grow into a management role.
* Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to align stakeholders.
* A collaborative, goal-oriented mindset with the ability to inspire and support your team.


Embrace the challenge and join us!
  
Our Hiring Process
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Architect
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating many opportunities for people like **YOU** — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.


At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. Moreover, this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a **GitHub and Azure DevOps Specialist.**


**Position Overview**  

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated Customer Engineer with extensive expertise in GitHub and all GitHub enterprise-level Microsoft products. The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in helping our customers leverage GitHub’s full potential to enhance their software development processes and improve overall productivity. This role combines technical expertise with customer-facing responsibilities, ensuring a dynamic and impactful career.


**Key Responsibilities**  

As a Customer Engineer, you will:


* Provide expert-level technical support and guidance to enterprise customers on GitHub, Azure DevOps, and associated Microsoft technologies.
* Assist in designing, implementing, and optimizing GitHub and Azure DevOps setups tailored to the specific needs of each client.
* Conduct comprehensive training sessions and workshops for customers, covering best practices, advanced features, and integration techniques.
* Develop and maintain technical documentation, including guides, tutorials, and troubleshooting resources.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest GitHub and Microsoft technologies, continuously improving your knowledge and skills.

**Technical Requirements**  

**Qualifications**


* Proven experience with GitHub and Azure DevOps in an enterprise environment.
* Strong understanding of version control systems, CI/CD pipelines, DevOps practices, and Agile methodology.
* Experience with popular automation tools in the market.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Strong communication and presentation skills.
* Ability to travel as needed to meet with customers and attend industry events.
* Fluent in English.

**Required Skills**


* Strong experience with GitHub, GitHub Advanced Security, Azure DevOps, Visual Studio, and other Microsoft development tools.
* Knowledge of cloud computing and infrastructure as code (IaC) principles.
* Familiarity with scripting languages such as YAML, PowerShell, Python, or Bash.

**GitHub and Azure DevOps Products Technical Requirements**  

You should have strong expertise in:


* GitHub repository management and governance models.
* GitHub Actions, including YAML script creation.
* GitHub and Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines, including template builds, testing, and validation.
* Integration of GitHub with Azure DevOps.
* Creation of IaC code standard templates for Azure services.
* Building application code templates for use across multiple projects.

**Nice to Have:**


* Knowledge of Kubernetes, AKS (Azure Kubernetes Services), Kubernetes security, Helm Charts, GitOps, and the Azure cloud platform (IaaS and PaaS).
* Experience with GitHub Copilot and GitHub Codespaces.
  

We are looking for someone with strong communicatio and presentation skills who can handle challenging situations with confidence. You should be committed to ownership and able to propose delivery roadmaps based on opportunities, and have a constant drive to learn and improve.


In this role, you will demonstrate technical leadership and handle escalations effectively. You will engage with stakeholders, business, and application owners, drive troubleshooting efforts, and provide clear action plans, following up to closure. Collaboration and partnership with team members both internally and externally are key.


This role is ideal for individuals who thrive in a dynamic environment, enjoy solving complex problems, and are passionate about helping customers succeed with cutting-edge technology. We encourage applications from all genders and backgrounds to bring diverse perspectives to our team.
company_addresses: 500 Frank W. Burr Boulevard Teaneck, NJ 07666

title: Business Development Representative
description:
**Join Us as a Business Development Representative (BDR) and kick start your career in sales!**


Are You Ready to Shape the Future of Sales in the world of technical documentation?**At Paligo, we’re not just selling a product—we’re enabling the world’s leading companies to create, manage, and deliver technical documentation like never before.** As a globally leading SaaS company in the field of Component Content Management Systems (CCMS), Paligo is redefining how businesses collaborate, innovate, and achieve their goals. Our customers include Amazon, Fujifilm, Mitsubishi, and many other global leaders.


We’re looking for an ambitious **Business Development Representative (BDR)** to join our high-performing sales team. **This role is based at our headquarters in Solna, Stockholm**, where you’ll be part of a dynamic and collaborative team committed to driving growth. While we embrace flexibility, we believe that the best collaboration happens in person, so this is a hybrid role with an emphasis on in-office work in Stockholm.

### **What You’ll Do**


As a **BDR at Paligo**, you’ll play a key role in identifying and qualifying sales opportunities to support our growing pipeline. You’ll collaborate closely with Account Executives and Marketing to generate new business opportunities and create meaningful connections with potential customers.

* Research and identify potential customers using tools like LinkedIn Sales Navigator, HubSpot, and other prospecting platforms.

* Engage with prospects through personalized outreach (email, phone, social media) to understand their needs and introduce them to Paligo.

* Qualify inbound leads and pass them on to the sales team for further development.

* Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to develop and refine outreach strategies.

* Maintain detailed and accurate records in our CRM (HubSpot) to ensure seamless handoffs and insights.

* Act as the first point of contact for potential customers, representing Paligo’s values and capabilities with professionalism and enthusiasm.


### **What We’re Looking For**


We’re seeking a motivated, goal-oriented BDR with a passion for creating meaningful connections and driving growth. To excel in this role, you should:

* Have 1-2 years of experience in sales, business development, or a customer-facing role in a SaaS environment

* Be comfortable working in a fast-paced, scale-up environment where adaptability and a proactive mindset are key.

* Be an excellent communicator, able to build rapport with prospects and colleagues alike.

* Be highly organized and detail-oriented, with strong time-management skills.

* Be fluent in English, both written and verbal (additional language skills are a bonus).


**Bonus Points If You Have:**

* Experience with CRM tools like HubSpot.

* Knowledge of value-based selling techniques.

* Exposure to the tech industry or experience with CCMS, CMS, or related solutions.


### **Why You’ll Love Working at Paligo**

* **Impactful Work**: Your contributions will directly influence our growth and success as we scale globally.

* **Collaborative Culture**: Join a passionate team that values open communication, teamwork, and innovation.

* **Professional Growth**: We invest in your career development with training, mentorship, and opportunities to advance.

**Perks and Benefits**: Competitive compensation, health-promoting activities, and a strong emphasis on work-life balance.

### **Who We Are**


At Paligo, we’re reshaping the world of content management with our innovative cloud-based platform. Our mission is to empower businesses with exceptional tools and support to achieve their goals, and we’re excited to bring on talented individuals who share our vision.

### **Join Us and Make an Impact**


If you’re ready to be part of a fast-growing SaaS company and help drive our success, we’d love to hear from you! Learn more about our team and culture on our careers page.

title: Visma Enterprise is looking for its next Software...
description:
**Join Our Innovative Development Team!**


Are you a developer who thrives on tackling complex logic and navigating challenging domains? Do you aspire to be a driving force in an exceptional team working on pioneering projects with the latest tools, frameworks, and technologies? If so, this is the opportunity for you! We are seeking a developer to join us on our journey to evolve a cutting-edge, market-leading service.


Do you feel a passion about creating cutting-edge cloud services? Join a team that thrives on drive, dedication, and innovation. As a valued team member, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping every facet of our modern cloud platform - from business logic and user interface to testing, infrastructure, and delivery.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* Design & Develop: Your primary focus will be designing and developing the business logic of our service, ensuring high-quality, robust solutions.
* Versatility & Growth: Depending on your interests and background, you'll have the opportunity to delve into architectural work, frontend development, or other areas within our service.
* Collaborate & Innovate: Engage actively in architectural decisions and discussions. Every team member's opinion is valued, and we encourage a collaborative environment where ideas flourish.

 **About You:**

* Analytical Thinker: You excel at understanding complex business logic and translating it into actionable, high-quality solutions.
* Experience & Expertise: Ideally, you bring years of experience as a software developer and some architectural knowledge. Alternatively, a robust analytical capacity compensates for fewer years of professional experience.
* Team Player & Lifelong Learner: Willing to share your insights and knowledge while continuously expanding your skill set. You thrive in a team setting and are eager to explore emerging technologies and possibilities.

 **Why Join Us?**


Alongside being part of an exceptional team, you'll integrate into Visma's vibrant developer community, home to thousands of developers and specialists. Enjoy continuous learning opportunities through developer guilds, Slack channels, and frequent training sessions and inspirational presentations.

 **Benefits**


Visma provides exceptional benefits, including private health insurance, a wellness allowance, and a flexible work environment that supports both remote and office-based work. If this opportunity resonates with you, we are eager to connect and learn more about you!


We review applications on a rolling basis, so don't wait - apply today!

 **Questions?**


If you want to learn more about the position or the process, please contact Staffan Spjuth, Development Manager, Visma Enterprise Sweden, email: staffan.spjuth@visma.com, Phone: +46703836505

title: Senior Solution Sales Executive - Nordics
description:
- **Devoteam is a leading Google Cloud Partner, empowering businesses to harness the full potential of Google Cloud technologies.**  

  

With 20+ years ofsuccessful Google Cloud implementations and a team of certified experts, we drive digital transformation across various industries. We foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning, providing you with the tools and support you need to excel in your career.


At Devoteam, we champion a revolutionary "New Way of Work" that prioritizes flexibility, personal growth, and joint success.

  
**Accelerate Your Career: Senior Solution Sales Executive - Google Cloud**

Are you a seasoned sales professional with a passion for cloud technology and a proven track record of success in the IT consulting space? Devoteam is seeking a highly motivated Senior Solution Sales Executive to join our expanding Google Cloud practice. In this role, you will drive new business acquisition and revenue growth by selling our comprehensive suite of Google Cloud consulting services and solutions, with a focus on professional services.


**What You'll Do:**

* **Develop and execute a strategic sales plan:** Target key accounts, identify opportunities, and build a strong pipeline to achieve ambitious quotas and revenue targets.
* **Become a Trusted Advisor:** Conduct in-depth needs assessments, understand client challenges, and position Devoteam as their go-to partner for Google Cloud solutions.
* **Deliver Winning Presentations:** Craft and deliver compelling sales presentations that showcase the value proposition of our Google Cloud offerings, emphasizing our expertise in professional services.
* **Collaborate with Experts:** Work closely with our technical consultants to design and propose tailored solutions that address client requirements, ensuring seamless project delivery.
* **Negotiate and Close Deals:** Secure favorable terms and conditions, maximizing revenue and profitability while building long-term client relationships.
* **Stay Ahead of the Curve:** Maintain a deep understanding of the evolving Google Cloud ecosystem, including new products, services, and market trends, to provide cutting-edge solutions.

  
* **Proven Success:** A demonstrable track record of exceeding sales targets in the IT consulting services industry, with experience selling technology solutions.
* **Cloud Expertise:** Strong understanding of cloud computing concepts, with specific knowledge of the Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* **Enterprise Focus:** Experience selling to enterprise clients is highly desirable, with a proven ability to navigate complex sales cycles and build relationships with key decision-makers.
* **Communication & Presentation Excellence:** Exceptional communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
* **Negotiation & Closing Prowess:** Strong negotiation and closing skills, with a proven ability to secure favorable deals.
* **Team Player:** Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.
* **Education:** Bachelor's degree in business, technology, or a related field.

  
- Devoteam is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected. We encourage applications from individuals with diverse backgrounds and experiences.



	* **Competitive Compensation:** Enjoy a competitive compensation package with an uncapped commission structure, rewarding your hard work and success.
	* **Comprehensive Benefits:** Benefit from comprehensive health insurance, a retirement plan, and generous paid time off.
	* **Growth Opportunities:** Take advantage of excellent opportunities for professional development and career advancement within our growing Google Cloud practice.
	* **Cutting-Edge Technology:** Work with the latest Google Cloud technologies and contribute to impactful projects that transform businesses.
	* **Dynamic Culture:** Be part of a dynamic, supportive, and collaborative team culture that values innovation and personal growth.
	* **Flexible Work Arrangements:** Enjoy flexible work arrangements that allow you to balance your professional and personal life.**To Apply:**

Please submit your resume and cover letter. We are excited to hear from you!

title: Solution Architect for Tech Sustainability
description:
**Job Description**
 At H&M Group, sustainability is at the heart of everything we do. As part of Tech Sustainability, our mission is to build a platform for real-time sustainability data, helping us achieve ambitious environmental goals and reduce our carbon footprint. We aim to connect sustainability data across our entire value chain—from production to logistics—enabling advanced calculations, predictions, and visualizations through reports and dashboards. Our vision is to fuel a positive impact on our ecosystem by leading the way in sustainability.
   

  

 We are looking for a Solution Architect to join our team in our mission to build a world-class sustainability platform for external reporting of ESG legislation. You will be responsible for driving end-to-end architecture solutions for sustainability with close collaboration to the business and other stakeholders within tech. As a solution architect you are responsible for translating business- and tech requirements into architecture blueprints and identifying areas in need of improvements, holistically evaluate the architecture and use deep technical expertise to understand the business impact of a technical components, recommending and implementing new solutions. Provide leadership related to the solution development by being responsible for the architecture and delivery of a solution or portfolio of solutions. The Solution Architect needs to ensure alignment with enterprise architecture standards, advancing the architecture towards the target state.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Contextualize business strategy and objectives into capabilities and architectural vision and strategy
* Develop architecture roadmaps and blueprints, creating design artifacts such as Logical Information Models
* Translate business and technical requirements into architecture that guides solution development and supports efficient collaboration with data analysts and data engineers
* Evaluate technologies for strategic fit, contributing to business cases for tech shifts.
* Identify opportunities for improvement, addressing technical debt and enhancing value.
* Provide technical design reviews at various milestones to ensure alignment with architectural principles and organizational goals.
* Embed architecture thinking across the team and support less experienced individuals.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science or a related field.
* Experience in architecting/designing solutions built on Cloud (ideally Google or Azure).
* Proficiency in BigQuery, APIs, and other data-driven technologies to support real-time analytics.
* Ability to create both high-level and low-level design documentation and technical specifications, with hands-on experience in programming or software engineering.
* A strong problem-solver who can analyze complex issues, visualize concepts not yet concrete, and develop innovative solutions aligned with H&M’s sustainability goals.
* Demonstrated adaptability and creativity to navigate a fast-paced and evolving environment.
* Ability to provide architecture leadership, collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure a smooth handoff from design to implementation, and conducting technical design and quality reviews throughout project milestones.
* Experience evaluating and developing governance structures, methodologies, and compliance measures to ensure security and regulatory alignment (e.g., GDPR) in data handling.
* Commitment to quality and detail-oriented execution, with the drive to identify and address both current and potential obstacles or opportunities.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **full-time permanent position** 
 , starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden and requires
 **on-site presence** 
 3-4 days a week.
   

  

 We have an ongoing selection, so send in your application today! Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
*At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.*
*We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.*
**Company Description**
 H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here.

title: Customer Engineer, Cloud Security
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 10 years of experience in in selling security consulting services in the capacity of a technical business engineer in a cloud computing environment, or equivalent experience in a similar customer-facing role (e.g., within a professional services, solutions architect, or systems engineering team).
* Experience in cybersecurity technical solutions: SIEM/SOAR (EDR, XDR), Threat Intelligence (threat detection, malware intelligence, attack surface management), Cloud Security (CSPM, CWPP, CNAPP, or identity and access management systems).


**Preferred qualifications:**
* Certification in the Cloud or Security industry.
* Experience in either of these market sectors: retail, healthcare, energy or chemicals.
* Knowledge of product and solution market trends in the cybersecurity industry (e.g., ransomware, attack frameworks, zero trust, etc.).
* Ability to speak publicly and deliver technical presentations.
* Ability to travel up to 50% of the time as required.


**About The Job**
 The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are developed for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Work with Security, Business and Google Cloud teams to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand customer technical and compliance objections, and develop strategies to resolve technical blockers.
* Work with all Google Cloud Security products to demonstrate and validate solution benefits in customer and partner environments.
* Support Google Cloud Security opportunities and relationships, own technical aspects of solutions, deliver technical presentations, product and solution briefings, proofs-of-concepts and demos to customers, partners, and stakeholders.
* Prepare and deliver product messaging in an effort to highlight Google's solutions value proposition using techniques including presentations, product demonstrations, white papers, trial management, and response documents.
* Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events where applicable.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Solutions Architect
description:
Hello Network!
 



  





  





 I hope you're doing well today,
 



  





  





**We are currently recruiting for an interesting hybrid working Solutions Architect role for a major Financial Client in Solna, Sweden:** 




  





  





**Duration: 12 months + extensions** 




**Location: Solna (Hybrid Working)** 




**Pay Rate: Negotiable** 




**English Speaking (Swedish a plus)** 




  





  





**If you know anyone that could be suitable we offer referral rewards for a successful placement.** 




  





  





**Job Role:** 




  





  




* **The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of driving pre-studies for Financial ERP system implementation, transitioning to live environments, and ensuring alignment with the organization’s long-term goals.**
* **You will play a critical role in designing and modernizing our financial solutions architecture, ensuring scalability and efficiency.**
* **Additionally, you will drive transformation towards our new cloud-based Financial ERP by creating clear roadmaps and plans for the modernization of the current technology landscape within the Finance & Accounting area, which includes solutions ranging from on-premises mainframe systems to cloud-developed systems as needed.**
* **The work will be executed in close collaboration with key Financial ERP program stakeholders, including business architects, process and integration specialists, developers, and system integrator resources (functional leads, solution architects, etc**



  





  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  





  




* Support and contribute to pre-studies and assessments for the implementation of cloud-based Financial ERP systems, providing insights and recommendations for successful deployment.
* Support and oversee the complete implementation and transition process for Financial ERP solutions, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.
* Design and architect the overall structure of the Financial ERP system, ensuring it meets the organization’s financial and operational needs.
* Utilize deep knowledge of system architecture, configuration, and troubleshooting to optimize Financial ERP performance and user experience.
* Support and contribute to integration efforts between Financial ERP systems and other applications, ensuring data integrity and process efficiency.
* Provide technical documentation and support for Financial ERP implementations, including detailed design specifications and user manuals.
* Support and contribute to conversion efforts, ensuring smooth transition of financial data into the new Financial ERP system.
* Design and implement Financial ERP cloud integrations with other systems, maintaining compliance with financial reporting standards.
* Offer technical guidance and support throughout the Financial ERP implementation lifecycle, ensuring best practices are followed.
* Translate business requirements into effective technical solutions, enhancing Financial ERP functionalities and process efficiency.
* Support the modernization of the current technology landscape towards a modern financial data and reporting ecosystem, including developing an integration strategy.
* Foster strong collaboration between engineering, business, and architecture teams to achieve business objectives and OKRs as one cohesive unit.
* Coach and support teams in understanding direction and strategy, providing guidance on roadmaps and operational excellence in modernization activities to meet the future target architecture.
* Exhibit strong change management skills to navigate organizational shifts related to Financial ERP adoption and usage.
* Foster collaboration and achieve great results through effective teamwork and partnerships.
* Manage stakeholders effectively, creating long-lasting relationships that support project goals.



  





  





**Qualifications:** 




  





  




* Required: Technical degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Solution Architect or Application Architect, with a focus on cloud-based Financial ERP solutions.
* Strong background in financial solutions, preferably within the insurance sector.
* Demonstrated expertise in Financial ERP architecture, design, and implementation, with a solid understanding of financial reporting and analytics.
* Proficient in translating complex business needs into scalable technical solutions within Financial ERP systems.
* Experience in leading distributed teams effectively.



  





  





 If you are interested, or you know someone who could be please reach out and we can arrange a time to speak?

title: Technical Product Manager - Shared Components (Real Time Communication)
description:
